quotes.quote: Genetics help to some degree, but the most important thing is the mind and the spirit. These two are even more powerful than physical characteristics that are passed on.
The laws of genetics apply even if you refuse to learn them.
Heredity is what sets the parents of a teenager wondering about each other.
Your genetics load the gun. Your lifestyle pulls the trigger.
Genetics is about how information is stored and transmitted between generations.
Genetics is all about showcasing human beauty along with high-quality performance.
Genetics is where we come from. It's deeply natural to want to know.
Your genetics is not your destiny.
Genetics do play a role in how you consciously or subconsciously manifest your true self.
Don't be ashamed or proud of your genetics,for you have no contribution towards it.
Heredity provides for the modification of its own machinery.
Heredity is a splendid phenomenon that relieves us of responsibility for our shortcomings.
Genetics is crude, but neuroscience goes directly to work on the brain, and the mind follows.
Genetics play a huge part in who we are. But we also have free will.
